mapper.select: select count_value from `count` where obj_id=#{objId} and obj_type=#{objType} and count_key=#{key} and is_deleted=0
mapper.update: update `count` set count_value = count_value+#{value} where count_key=#{key} and obj_id=#{objId} and obj_type=#{objType}

update.foreach: update `count` set count_value = count_value+#{counter.countValue} where count_key=#{counter.countKey} and obj_id=#{counter.objId} and obj_type=#{objType}
